title: Rocky Horror Fans...please don't throw eggs!
body:
We've made a mention of it in the past on the blog, but no official post, so here's the news: There will be no presentation of ROCKY HORROR PICTURE SHOW this year due to scheduling conflicts across the board with the parties involved. But that just means next year will be bigger and better than ever! Right? In the meantime, here are some other options:
  • Tuesday October 27th, 9:30p @ The Blue Note in Columbia, MO
  • Friday October 30th & 31st, Midnight @ The Tivoli in St. Louis
  • Last year a few local bars and clubs also did screenings, so as we hear about them, we'll post them here.
If you know of any other RHPS events in the region, feel free to write about them in the comments section, and I'll put it on the blog post. See all you Rocky Fans next year!
author: Nicole

comments.author: johnnyb
comments.body: BTW, Rocky just played Fri and Sat at the Screenland Armour here in beautiful KCMO....and it normally plays monthly at the Armour or Screenland Crossroads/KCMO...
